title: Digital Literacy Workshop
description: Empowering rural communities in Kollam district with essential digital skills, covering smartphone usage, internet safety, and digital payment systems.

title: Solar Power Initiative
description: Successfully installed solar power systems in 5 rural schools, providing clean energy access to over 200 students across Pathanamthitta district.

title: Healthcare Technology Summit
description: Annual summit bringing together healthcare professionals and engineers to develop innovative solutions for rural healthcare challenges in Kerala.

title: Clean Water Project
description: Deployed low-cost water purification systems in 3 coastal villages, ensuring access to clean drinking water for 150+ families affected by salinity.
